CustomField.description: 0 = rep active for full quota period, 1 = rep churned during the quota period
CustomField.formula: IF( AND ( NOT( ISNULL ( Role_End_Date__c )= TRUE), Role_End_Date__c <> Fiscal_Period_End_Date__c ), TRUE, FALSE)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: 0 = rep active for full quota period, 1 = rep churned during the quota period
CustomField.label: Active for Full Quarter
